items.sentence: I think that Tom was just trying to apologize.
Three nurses looked after Tom in the hospital.
I heard that Tom was killed by a drunk driver.
I heard that Tom got killed in suicide attack.
Tom will be on the same plane that I'll be on.
I'm going to Australia for a couple of months.
I'm going to the beach the day after tomorrow.
Mary was the prettiest girl Tom had ever seen.
Do you know why Tom doesn't have many friends?
Tom and Mary both work only three days a week.
